shipping_time: Orders typically ship within 3-5 business days. You will receive a tracking number once your order has shipped.
return_policy: Our return policy allows you to return your mattress within 100 nights for a full refund. The mattress must be in good condition with no damage.
warranty: All of our mattresses come with a 10-year limited warranty. This covers manufacturing defects but does not cover normal wear and tear.
payment_options: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and offer financing options through Affirm for qualified buyers.
foundation_requirements: Most of our mattresses work well with platform beds, box springs, and adjustable bases. However, placing a mattress directly on the floor may void the warranty.
